byline.contributor: Michael Forsythe contributed reporting from Hong Kong. Emily Feng, Adam Wu and Kiki Zhao contributed research.
byline.original: By JANE PERLEZ and CHRIS BUCKLEY

abstract: Police in northeastern China are investigating Hongxiang conglomerate on suspicion of committing 'serious economic crimes'; United States and South Korea have accused firm  of providing North Korea with materials to be used in production of nuclear weapons.

keywords.value: Dandong Hongxiang Industrial Development Company Ltd
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The conglomerate deals in materials that researchers in South Korea and the United States say can be used in the production of nuclear weapons.
snippet: The conglomerate deals in materials that researchers in South Korea and the United States say can be used in the production of nuclear weapons....

headline.main: China Announces Inquiry Into Company Trading With North Korea
headline.print_headline: Chinese Firm Suspected of Aiding North Korea
